meteringrange: 0 to 20 EV (Matrix or center-weighted metering at ISO 100 equivalent, f/1.4 lens, at 20°C/68°F) 2 to 20 EV (Spot metering at ISO 100 equivalent, f/1.4 lens at 20°C/68°F)
exposurebracketing: Yes 2 or 3 frames in steps of 1/3, 1/2, 2/3 or 1 EV

compatiblelenses: Type G/D AF NIKKOR: All functions supported IX Nikkor lenses cannot be used DX AF NIKKOR: All functions possible Other AF NIKKOR: All functions supported except autofocus and 3D color matrix metering II AI-P NIKKOR: All functions supported except 3D color matrix metering II PC Micro-NIKKOR does not support some functions Non-CPU: Can be used in modes A and M; color matrix metering and aperture value display if user provides lens data (AI lenses only)
